page.title: 14CUSTOMS
page.content: {Harvest festivals}_ at the church and chapel in October to coincide with Manaccan Feast.On the Friday before, the church has its weeknight service with pasty supper and on the Monday following the chapel has its service with supper plus a sale of produce.St. Anthony Harvest Festival is in September. {Good Friday}_ longstanding tradition to pick trigs (cockles) at St.Anthony and Helford. Often hundreds of people turn up to do this. {Hallowe'en}_ some "trick or treating". {Shooting}_ it is the custom to go on Boxing Day for the enthusiasts. Annual barbeque at chapel and fete at Bosahan in August. Christmas lunch for elderly provided by the Women's Institute.
